intro.title: Our Story
intro.content: Founded in 1994, DORIKO LIMITED has grown from a regional shipping company to a global maritime leader. With a commitment to safety, efficiency, and innovation, we have built a reputation for excellence in the shipping industry.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To provide world-class maritime transportation services that exceed customer expectations while maintaining the highest standards of safety and environmental responsibility.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To be the preferred global shipping partner, recognized for innovation, reliability, and sustainable practices in maritime transportation.
